comment:
"Провальный чек Lore:Warp по Сфере ограждения

В обломки положите пжл тело демона"

languages.text: В обломках Сферы ограждения — артефакта, гасящего психические силы вокруг себя, лежит иссохшее тело демона. Останки настолько мерзки, что глаза будто сами смотрят мимо них.

traits.locale_text: В обломках Сферы ограждения — артефакта, гасящего психические силы вокруг себя, лежит иссохшее тело демона. Останки настолько мерзки, что глаза будто сами смотрят мимо них.

languages.text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.
languages.original_text: В обломках Сферы ограждения — артефакта, гасящего психические силы вокруг себя, лежит иссохшее тело демона. Останки настолько мерзки, что глаза будто сами смотрят мимо них.

traits.locale_text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

languages.text: 一个已经碎了的遮蔽力场，这件制品可以抑制附近的所有灵能能力。它被放在某只恶魔干瘪的尸体旁边。恶魔的尸体实在是太令人作呕，你根本不愿意直视它。
languages.original_text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

traits.locale_text: 一个已经碎了的遮蔽力场，这件制品可以抑制附近的所有灵能能力。它被放在某只恶魔干瘪的尸体旁边。恶魔的尸体实在是太令人作呕，你根本不愿意直视它。

languages.text: Hay una Esfera de Oclusión, un artefacto que inhibe los poderes psíquicos a su alrededor, hecha añicos junto al cuerpo reseco de un daemon. Los restos son tan repugnantes que tus ojos se niegan a mirarlos directamente.
languages.original_text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

traits.locale_text: Hay una Esfera de Oclusión, un artefacto que inhibe los poderes psíquicos a su alrededor, hecha añicos junto al cuerpo reseco de un daemon. Los restos son tan repugnantes que tus ojos se niegan a mirarlos directamente.

languages.text: ディーモンの死体の横には付近のサイキック能力を減衰させるアーティファクト、オクルーディング・スフィアが粉々に砕かれて転がっている。残骸はあまりにもおぞましく、直視することができない。
languages.original_text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

traits.locale_text: ディーモンの死体の横には付近のサイキック能力を減衰させるアーチファクト、オクルーディング・スフィアが粉々に砕かれて転がっている。残骸はあまりにもおぞましく、直視することができない。

languages.text: Eine zerstörte Unterdrückungssphäre, ein Artefakt, das psionische Fähigkeiten in der Nähe dämpft, liegt neben dem ausgetrockneten Körper eines Dämons. Die Überreste sind so abstoßend, dass deine Augen sich weigern, sie direkt anzusehen.
languages.original_text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

traits.locale_text: Eine zerstörte Unterdrückungssphäre, ein Artefakt, das psionische Fähigkeiten in der Nähe dämpft, liegt neben dem ausgetrockneten Körper eines Dämons. Die Überreste sind so abstoßend, dass deine Augen sich weigern, sie direkt anzusehen.

languages.text: Une sphère d'inhibition brisée, un artefact qui interfère avec les capacités psychiques à proximité, git à côté du corps desséché d'un démon. Comme dotés de leur propre volonté, vos yeux refusent de s'attarder sur les restes répugnants du cadavre.
languages.original_text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

traits.locale_text: Une sphère d'inhibition brisée, un artefact qui interfère avec les capacités psychiques à proximité, git à côté du corps desséché d'un démon. Comme dotés de leur propre volonté, vos yeux refusent de s'attarder sur les restes répugnants du cadavre.

languages.text: Yakınlarındaki ruhsezi yeteneklerini körelten Önleyici Küre eseri; parçalanmış hâlde, bir iblisin kurumuş bedeninin yanında duruyor. Kalıntılar o kadar tiksindirici ki gözlerin onlarla doğrudan temas kurmayı reddediyor.
languages.original_text: A shattered Occluding Sphere, an artefact that dampens any nearby psychic abilities, is lying next to the desiccated body of a daemon. The remains are so revolting that your eyes refuse to look directly at them.

traits.locale_text: Yakınlarındaki psişik yetenekleri körelten bir eser olan Önleyici Küre parçalanmış durumda ve bir iblisin kurumuş bedeninin yanında duruyor. Kalıntılar o kadar tiksindirici ki gözlerin onlara direkt olarak bakmayı reddediyor.
